about_the_game:
To our community– thank you for supporting Lynked: Banner of the Spark and our new team! We’re humbled to have you along with us as we continue to develop this game for you. To celebrate Early Access launch, we're releasing the Supporter Pack so you can take down the Combots in Style! Gear up with new player outfits in the Spark-Tek theme, ten weapon class variants, backpacks, head wear, livery, and an Owl GoodBot to keep you company on missions. Taking a break from saving the world? Gild your space with a variety of decor items to make your town stand out!

The Supporter Pack: Battle Ready Includes:

Player Outfits:
  • Spark-Tek Commander outfit with 11 color variations
  • Spark-Tek Scout outfit with 11 color variations
  • This pack also includes 6 total alternate styles for the commander and scout outfits

Weapon Variants:
  • All 10 weapon classes in the Spark-Tek theme

Accessories:
  • 2x Backpacks
  • 2x Head wear options with 11 Colors each
  • This pack also includes 6 alternate headwear styles

Liveries:
  • Spark-Tek Livery

GoodBot Cosmetics:
  • OwlBot with 11 additional color options

Town Decor Items:
  • Spark-Tek Worktable
  • Spark Tek Generator
  • Spark-Tek Statue
  • 2x Spark Tomes
  • Gates & Fences
  • 4x Floor options
  • 3x Wallpaper options
  • 3x Road options

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9 Gen / AMD Ryzen 3 4100 4 cores 3.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8 Gen / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6 cores 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Celebrate Lynked: Banner of the Spark's Early Access launch with the Supporter Pack: Battle Ready! Featuring new player outfits, weapon class variants, backpacks, headwear, livery, an Owl GoodBot, and plenty of decor items to choose from, gear up and take down the Combots in style.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
